title: Parameter change: Signed block window, Min signed per window, Downtime jail duration, Slash fraction downtime, min deposit amount
description:
**Summary: increase signed blocks window to 20000, decrease min signed per window to 5%,
 
      increase downtime jail duration to 30 minutes, decrease slash fraction downtime to 0.01%,
 
      increase proposal deposit amount to 10000 AASTRA.** 


      This param change proposal will raise the minimum deposit amount to 20000 AASTRA. We do see the need to raise the fees to prevent spam.
